controller

Class PersonalExpenseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.PersonalExpenseController

  • public class PersonalExpenseController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contain most of the operation related to Personal Expense Manager

    This class prepare various method to handle the user action. This class make use of Repository to store the data. Also its using ReportService to generate different required reports.

    Author:
    Mohammed

    • Method Detail

      • onAddCategory

        public void onAddCategory(java.lang.String name)
        This method is taking expense category name as input to add new category in the system.

      • onCategoryList

        public void onCategoryList()
        call this method to print existing category

      • onExpenseEntry

        public void onExpenseEntry()
        Call this method to enter expense details. The entered details will be added in repository.

      • onExpenseList

        public void onExpenseList()
        The method prints all entered expenses.

      • onMonthlyExpenseList

        public void onMonthlyExpenseList()
        This method is called from menu to prepare monthly-wise-expense-total. Its using ReportService to calculate the report. The returned result is printed by this method. Means this method invoke a call to generate report then result is printed by the method.

      • onYearlyExpenseList

        public void onYearlyExpenseList()
        This method is called from menu to prepare yearly-wise-expense-total. Its using ReportService to calculate the report. The returned result is printed by this method. Means this method invoke a call to generate report then result is printed by the method.

      • onCategorizedExpenseList

        public void onCategorizedExpenseList()
        This method is called from menu to prepare category-wise-expense-total. Its using ReportService to calculate the report. The returned result is printed by this method. Means this method invoke a call to generate report then result is printed by the method.

      • onExit

        public void onExit()
        This method stop JVM before that it store data permanantly
